u.a: Wawrzon, Dr. Weist, Mother, Hanna and Kasia are sitting on the floor. Wawrzon wants to get a piece of candy. [Then,] Wawrzon notices a lady-bug .
a lady-bug has black spots not red ones . can you see that it has red spots ?
will you take it on your finger ?
but it doesńt bite, dońt be afraid . see ? try .
Wawrzon is looking at the tape recorder .
now uncle, turn on the tape recorder . turn (it) on now .
Wawrzon wants to take some more candy from the box . He gives the box to Kasia .
more ? and what do you have to do ?
Wawrzon shows Kasia that he has candy .
should I open it for you ?
Warzon gives the box to Kasia .
Wawrzon points to the box with his finger .
Kasia is trying to open the box .
yes . no not like that . like this . yes .
Wawrzon takes a few pieces of candy .
oh what is going to happen now ?
I can see that you are eating . areńt you eating too much by any chance ?
do you think that the lady-bug would like to eat some candy ?
Wawrzon gives a piece of candy to the ladybug .
son be careful because there is hot tea here, you know Wawrzon .
I am careful, I am careful .
are you going to eat some more ?
until you have a belly ache ?
Mother comes and offers Wawrzon a cup of tea .
are you going to drink with us ?
no, this is Pepsi, isńt it ?
Wawrzon hands a book to Kasia and asks her to read it to him .
grandma is calling her grandson . should I read some more ?
Mother and Wawrzon look at the story .
listen Wawrzon here is this one . who is it eh ?
a fly is flying to Wojtaszek's ear . Wojtek ...?
Kasia is reading a line from a rhymed story . and wants Wawrzon to finish the phrase . Wawrzon does not answer so she whispers to him the word that should be there .
a fat bumble bee is flying to Wojtaszek's chin ...
"Wojtaszek" is a diminutive form of the proper name "Wojciech".
Wawrzon would you like me to read you some more ?
hasńt your mother ever read them to you ?
Wawrzon goes and fetches some building blocks then he returns to the book .
Hanna tries to put some blocks together .
is this how you put it together ?
is this how you put these blocks together ?
show us how you put it together . can you do it ?
Wawrzon will you show uncle your excavator truck ?
well, where is your excavator truck ?
Wawrzon runs to the room to get the truck .
"Witek" is the name of Wawrzońs friend .
what else did he do son ? what ?
Witek will lend it to you again . Witek took the excavator truck from you .
Dr . Weist gives Wawrzon a small key and a toy .
Wawrzon creeps under the sofa and calls Kasia .
do you want to ride piggy-back ?
the girls came too . and grandma didńt come ?
Wawrzon and Mother go to the bathroom .
Wawrzon is going to get something to drink . He wants to get it in a bottle with a nipple .
Wawrzon said "pramy" instead of "pierzemy" because he took the wrong root from the verb "prać"
Wawrzon wants to turn on the tape recorder .
turn on the tape recorder mommy .
Mother shows him an old record player .
I think it is broken you know ?
broken record player, old record player .
show uncle where the current is . Do you know what this tape recorder is for ?
where do you plug it in ?
where do you plug in this rope ? the rope, you put (it) here probably .
włącza = włącza się $MOR $LOS ; to = ten $MOR $SUB ; wkłada = wkłada się $MOR $LOS ;
by "rope" Wawrzon means "wire". the verbs "włącza" and "wkłada" should be reflexivized .
Wawrzon plays with the tape recorder . he turns it on . Kasia wants him to say something so that it can be recorded .
Wawrzon notices the tape turning in the cassette player .
mommy is there in the room, go .
I am going with the tape recorder .
Wawrzon takes the tape recorder in his hand .
do you know that uncle does not allow you to touch that tape recorder ?
I will play with this (one) . I wanted to see the tape .
no . go and drink some juice there in the kitchen .
